title: Book Bite #5: Is It Time To Rethink Everything You Know?
description:
Adam Grant needs no introduction, but we’ll give him one anyway. He’s an organizational psychologist at Wharton. He hosts the chart-topping “WorkLife” podcast. And to top it all off, he is one of our curators here at the Next Big Idea Club. In his latest book, Think Again , Adam makes a nuanced case for the power of rethinking things. If you can learn how to check your ego, question your opinions, admit to being wrong, and demilitarize your dinner-table debates, then you’ll be on the way to a healthy, joyous, more enlightened life.
Check out Adam’s full interview with Rufus:
THINK AGAIN: Adam Grant on the Power of Changing Your Mind
